name: D.P.S: Weapons Testing Facility 2
summary: A tower defense game where you program your weapons with different components. Combine and rearrange the components to create the ultimate weapon and beat all the enemy waves.

name: D-Paddle vs. Crankquet
summary: A bespoke 2-player ping-pong game for the Playdate with D-pad controls for P1 and crank controls for P2.

name: Dps Idle
summary: Collect cards, upgrade cards, defeat monsters, join guilds and hire heroes. Raise your DPS!

name: D-Pad Hero 2
summary: Grab your controller and join in on the action in the ultimate rhythm music game for your Nintendo Entertainment System! Defeat the headbanging rock masters and reclaim the title of D-Pad Hero!

name: DPS Idle 2
summary: The long-awaited sequel to DPS Idle. Collect cards, upgrade cards, defeat monsters, join guilds and hire heroes. DPS IDLE 2!

name: DP.T: Dr Pepper Terror
summary:
You play as Little Billy, a kid who is staying with his Pappy over the summer and the man is crazy addicted to Dr. Pepper. So much so that he drinks himself into amnesia and forgets he has had any in the last 30+ years so he's constantly asking Billy to go fetch him some more from the store. Today, however, was different. Today, he asked Little Billy to get a case of Dr. Pepper from THE SHED. OooOOoo spooky. No really, the shed is crazy scary. Good luck, have fun. Gameplay is 30+ minutes depending on how much you explore.

There are two endings. One of which is pretty elusive. You'll have to big-brain think outside-of-the-box to figure it out.

This game is a parody of Dr. Pepper and Silent Hills P.T.

name: D-Pad Hero
summary: D-Pad Hero is a homebrew for NES based on Guitar Hero.

name: D Pistols
summary:
D Pistols is a fast-paced one-button game.

You are constantly moving up and down. You goal is to shoot all the enemies that are coming from the sides of the screen. When the enemies reach the middle of the screen they will go up or down depending on your current position. Press a button to change your direction and shoot sideways. Hold a button to charge and shoot in all four directions.

The game is over when any enemy touches you.
